response.overview: Jusuf (Bintang Prawinata P.), a corrupt official, meets with another official (Rendy Irfansyah R.) to discuss laundering money from bribes. Jusuf refused to use the services of a boss he considered less capable, aka Sutomo. The official suggested that Jusuf take advantage of the heated political situation.  A year later, Sutomo, Amat, and Eko got together. Sutomo seems to have changed, his life is simpler. News on the radio reported Jusuf's arrest and death sentence for corruption, possession of illegal weapons, illegal marriage and subversive acts. Sutomo, Amat, and Eko are grateful for Sutomo's changes and comment on the punishment their friend Jusuf received when he migrated to Jakarta.
response.title: The Corruptor (T. Joesoef Moeda Dalam)
